description:
Hello All,

We have two local speakers in this session James Yarrow and Phil Austin.

James Yarrow - Partitioning Party

Database Partitioning has been around for a while but is always being updated and adding new benefits. In today big data volume world, we to think fo how we are going to support these large tables.

Phil Austin - Power BI report server

Power Bi started in the cloud and has landed in your data centre (or iaas)
How does Power BI Report Server with comparisons with SSRS 2017 and the original Power BI (ie in the cloud). It has to be said I do think this is the future for MS BI on-prem. Will this be ending of SharePoint integration (if there’s time)?

18:00 - Starting
18:00 - 18:30 - Networking & intros
18:30 - 19:15 - 45 minute main session - Partitioning Party, Dev,DBA, and infra invited!
19:15 - 19:45 - Networking & pizza
19:45 - 20:30 - 45 minute second session - Power BI report server
20:30 - Networking & Social
title: SQL-Bristol Evening Session March 2018
